messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1150
messages.msgSnippet: ... On the plus side, having been married for 18 years, I can appreciate the unswerving devotion, AND the reluctance to change.   Betsy
messages.messageBody:
>I want a husband like that. Mine's about to take our 17 year old Jetta in

>for new brakes and fuel injection work. IT'S JUNK!

On the plus side, having been married for 18 years, I can appreciate the
unswerving devotion, AND the reluctance to change. <g>

Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1150
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/01 9:56:57 AM, RValvo7626@aol.com writes:  I want a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/01 9:56:57 AM, RValvo7626@... writes:

<< Dh is ready to trash
it and buy a new one. That is always his solution. >>

I want a husband like that. Mine's about to take our 17 year old Jetta in
for new brakes and fuel injection work. IT'S JUNK!

It's not the car I drive, but I'm still ashamed to know it. <g> (It was cool
when we bought it, before I was pregnant with Kirby, when it seemed really
big. We had a Kaypro II then...)

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1150
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/21/01 6:50:48 PM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/21/01 6:50:48 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< really *ignorant* ??? for ya??? I *always* turn OFF my computer
every night b/c this is what my sil taught me ... so??? you mean you
leave your's ON ... 24/7??? *really*??? is this what everyone else
does, too??? mannnnnnn, I KNEW there HAD to be an easier way :{
>>

We turned ours off every night when we first got it. Then we left it on
24/7. Recently since our move I have been turning it off daily. Now we are
back on 24/7. Our computer is all screwy from the move and all sorts of stuff
is going on. I really should take time and call Gateway. Dh is ready to trash
it and buy a new one. That is always his solution.

NICKI~
